sn22.134:2.1: “Idhavuso, assutava puthujjano rupassa samudayanca atthangamanca assadanca adinavanca nissarananca yathabhutam nappajanati.
sn22.134:2.5: vinnanassa samudayanca atthangamanca assadanca adinavanca nissarananca yathabhutam nappajanati.
sn22.134:3.1: Evam vutte, ayasma sariputto ayasmantam mahakotthikam etadavoca:
sn22.134:4.1: “Idhavuso, sutava ariyasavako rupassa samudayanca atthangamanca assadanca adinavanca nissarananca yathabhutam pajanati.
sn22.134:4.5: vinnanassa samudayanca atthangamanca assadanca adinavanca nissarananca yathabhutam pajanati.
